name: Betsy Brandt
info:
• 简体中文名: 贝茜·布兰特
  • 别名: 贝琪·勃兰特
  • 别名: Betsy Ann Brandt
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1976-11-14
  • 身高: 174cm
  • 出生地: Bay City, Michigan, U.S.
  • 配偶: Grady Olsen (1996 - present)
detail: Betsy Ann Brandt is an American actress. She is best known for portraying Marie Schrader in Breaking Bad. She currently co-stars in the CBS sitcom Life in Pieces.
